name: ABC
text:
"If you're going to be in a situation where beyond your control there's a lot of people around you, make sure you wear a mask."

As Pres. Trump gears up for his upcoming campaign rally, Dr. Anthony Fauci urges people take precautions in large groups. https://t.co/AHoxei0qyJ https://t.co/BDErkboFy6

name: ABC
text:
RT @ABCNewsLive: Dr. Todd Ellerin on COVID-19 infections in several states: "We're seeing more cases, more hospitalizations, more deaths...We need to do better." https://t.co/nmT9k3ytun

"Rally at your own risk," he adds, when asked about Pres. Trump's upcoming rally. https://t.co/7M49EiZyTi
